seo.title: Bus to Arienzo Beach from Hostel Brikette
seo.description: Catch the Amalfi Coast bus from Chiesa Nuova, ride three kilometres south, and take the cliffside stairs down to Arienzo Beach.

intro: Bãi biển Arienzo nằm cách Hostel Brikette vài km về phía nam và có thể đến dễ dàng nhất bằng xe buýt Bờ biển Amalfi.
Hãy làm theo các bước sau để tìm điểm dừng, mua vé, tự tin đạp xe và kết thúc chuyến đi bằng đúng cầu thang dẫn xuống bãi cát.

sections.title: Go to the Chiesa Nuova bus stop
body: Leave Hostel Brikette through the main entrance and walk down the stairs to the road.
Turn left and continue roughly 100 metres (330 feet) until you reach Bar Internazionale.
The SITA bus stop sits outside the bar in the Chiesa Nuova area, about 140 metres (490 feet) from the hostel.

sections.title: Buy bus tickets inside the bar
body: Enter Bar Internazionale and purchase your tickets from the tabacchi counter.
Ask for both outbound and return tickets — staff may recommend either one combined ticket or two singles depending on the current pricing.

sections.title: Wait for the Amalfi Coast bus
body: Cross the road to the marked bus stop opposite Bar Internazionale.
Stand where the driver can see you and flag the coach as it approaches from the Positano direction.

sections.title: Ride to the Arienzo stop
body: Stay alert during the journey — the bus will make intermediate stops based on passenger requests.
Expect the trip to cover roughly 3 kilometres (1.9 miles). Arienzo comes two to five minutes after the Positano Sponda stop.
Use mobile data or download Google Maps offline and search for "JFGW+X6 Arienzo, Province of Salerno" if you want live confirmation of the stop.

sections.title: Walk down to the beach
body: After stepping off the bus, walk a short distance back in the direction you arrived from.
Look for the Arienzo signpost and the staircase on the seaward side of the road, then follow the steps down to the lido entrance.

tips: Printed timetables list Positano stops; expect Arienzo to appear about 2–5 minutes after Positano Sponda when heading from town.
Buy return tickets before leaving the hostel — there are no shops at the beach to sell you more if you decide to stay longer.
Check our %LINK:beaches|Positano beaches overview% for Arienzo facilities, shuttle boats, and alternative ways back to town.
